title: Select stocks under ASM framework recover after falling for two days
content: Rain Ind, Alok Ind, Graphite India, Man Ind, HEG, Mirc Electronics, Prakash Ind, HIL, Waterbase and GVK Power have rallied an over 7% from their respective intra-day lows on the BSE on Wednesday.
contentSnippet: Rain Ind, Alok Ind, Graphite India, Man Ind, HEG, Mirc Electronics, Prakash Ind, HIL, Waterbase and GVK Power have rallied an over 7% from their respective intra-day lows on the BSE on Wednesday.
